Name: FW_VERSION
Recommendation: Sync with release tagging to avoid mismatches

Name: WIFI_DEFAULT_SSID
Recommendation: Move to provisioning storage before production

Name: WIFI_DEFAULT_PASS
Efficiency note: Long string in firmware; same risk as SSID
Recommendation: Require user-supplied password on first boot

Name: MQTT_DEFAULT_HOST
Efficiency note: Assumes LAN IP; recompile per site
Recommendation: Load from provisioning JSON or NVS

Name: LED_IDLE_BRIGHTNESS
Efficiency note: Brightness constant OK but repeated in logic
Recommendation: Document acceptable range to avoid overcurrent

Name: VISIT_ENTER_DELTA_G
Recommendation: Expose via config channel for tuning

Name: PIR_EVENT_SNAPSHOT_COUNT
Efficiency note: Fixed burst count; high memory cost
Recommendation: Allow override from OTA JSON when needed

Name: MINI_READY_TIMEOUT_MS
Recommendation: Track actual ready latency to revisit

Name: JWT_SECRET
Recommendation: Fail startup if value still default

Name: S3_BUCKET_INDICES
Efficiency note: Shared with photo bucket; risk of mixing

Name: HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL_MS
Efficiency note: Heartbeat drives ping loop; longer interval saves CPU

Name: OTA_MAX_BOOT_FAILS
Efficiency note: Map stored in RAM; resets on restart
Recommendation: Persist counts to disk for restarts

Name: DEFAULT_WS_URL
Recommendation: Read from Expo config or discovery payload

Name: brokerConfig.username
Recommendation: Inject via Expo env for each deployment
